messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Thanks for sending in examples.
Can you change them to use fmt.Println(...)
instead of fmt.Fprintln(os.Stdout, ...)?

Thanks.
Russ

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5503089/diff/7001/src/pkg/path/example_test.go
File src/pkg/path/example_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5503089/diff/7001/src/pkg/path/example_test.go#newcode1
src/pkg/path/example_test.go:1: package path_test
On 2012/01/16 23:19:54, rsc wrote:
> Please add the usual copyright notice
> and then a blank line before the package statement.

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5503089/diff/7001/src/pkg/path/example_test.go#newcode11
src/pkg/path/example_test.go:11: fmt.Fprintln(os.Stdout, path.Base("/a/b"))
On 2012/01/16 23:19:54, rsc wrote:
> Println

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5503089/diff/7001/src/pkg/path/example_test.go#newcode30
src/pkg/path/example_test.go:30: for _, v := range paths {
On 2012/01/16 23:19:54, rsc wrote:
> s/v/p/

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5503089/diff/7001/src/pkg/path/example_test.go#newcode31
src/pkg/path/example_test.go:31: fmt.Println(path.Clean(v))
On 2012/01/16 23:19:54, rsc wrote:
> fmt.Printf("Clean(%q) = %q\n", p, path.Clean(p))

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5503089/diff/7001/src/pkg/path/example_test.go#newcode58
src/pkg/path/example_test.go:58: dir, file := path.Split("static/myfile.css")
On 2012/01/16 23:19:54, rsc wrote:
> fmt.Printf("%q %q\n", path.Split("static/myfile.css"))

gc says this is invalid.
